mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FM_MEMBER ( msno , mname , memail, mpasswd , muid , mtel , mlevel , mimage , mimagesize , mip , mposition , mlocal, mintro , mpasswd ) values ( msno_seq.nextval , #{mname} , #{memail}, #{mpasswd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{muid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{mtel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mlevel,jdbcType=CHAR} , #{mimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{mimagesize,jdbcType=NUMBER} , #{mip,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{mposition,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{mlocal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mintro,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{mpasswd} )
